app.rightPanelDesc: This panel takes the remaining space.

patInput.title: GitHub PAT Settings
patInput.description: Manage your GitHub Personal Access Token. Changes take effect immediately.
patInput.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
patInput.requiredScope: Requires a PAT with repo scope.
patInput.storageInfo: Token is stored securely in your browser's IndexedDB.
patInput.savedAlertDesc: GitHub PAT verified and saved locally.
patInput.validationError: Invalid GitHub PAT or network error. Please check PAT and connection.
patInput.clearError: Failed to clear PAT from local storage.

fileTree.title: File Tree
fileTree.empty: Repository is empty or branch content is empty.
fileTree.deleteFileConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete file "{{fileName}}"? This action will modify the GitHub repository and cannot be undone.
fileTree.folderInstructionDescRename: Renaming folders and their contents via the API is complex. Please clone the repository locally, use the following Git commands to rename, then push the changes:
fileTree.folderInstructionDescDelete: Deleting folders and their contents via the API is complex. Please clone the repository locally, use the following Git commands to delete, then push the changes:
fileTree.gitMv: # 4. Rename folder (replace 'newName' with the actual new name)

createFileDialog.title: Create New File
createFileDialog.description: Enter the full path for the new file. Use '/' to create folders, e.g., src/components/NewFile.tsx.
